      • onlyIf

        public static <T> ActionUtils.Action<T> onlyIf(Spec<? super T> spec,
                                               Action<? super T> action)
        Returns an action delegating to the specified action only if the spec is satisfied by the object passed during execution.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the executing objects.
        Parameters:
        spec - a spec to filter the executing objects.
        action - an action to delegate to when the spec is satisfied.
        Returns:
        an action delegating to the specified action only if the spec is satisfied at execution, never null.
